schema.description: Audio tutorial content for Deck 2 Module 1 - Governance Proposal Interface

introductoryNarration.title: üìå Civic Governance Participation
introductoryNarration.content: Welcome to the governance interface where community decisions are made. This module enables you to review, discuss, and vote on proposals that shape the civic platform and community policies. Your voice matters in democratic governance.

navigationGuidance.title: üîç Participating in Democratic Decisions
navigationGuidance.content: Each proposal displays the issue description, community impact assessment, and current voting status. Review the details section for comprehensive information, check the discussion area for community feedback, then cast your vote using the approve, reject, or abstain options. Your civic tier determines your voting weight.

privacyNotice.title: üîí Anonymous Democratic Participation
privacyNotice.content: Your voting decisions are recorded with privacy protection. Individual votes remain confidential while aggregate results are transparent. The system prevents vote buying and coercion while maintaining democratic accountability.

nextStepsCue.title: ‚û°Ô∏è Shape Your Community's Future
nextStepsCue.content: Start reviewing active proposals and participating in governance discussions. Regular participation in democratic processes increases your civic reputation and may qualify you for advanced governance roles and responsibilities.
